name: Normal Ammo 2
description: Non-specialized ammo. More powerful than Normal Ammo 1

name: Normal Ammo 3
description: High-quality gunpowder ammo. Single-shot, but fast and impactful.

name: Pierce Ammo 1
description: Armor-piercing ammo that deals multiple hits to some monsters.

name: Pierce Ammo 2
description: High-grade armor-piercing ammo. Deals more hits than Pierce Ammo 1.

name: Pierce Ammo 3
description: Max-grade armor-piercing ammo. Deals numerous hits.

name: Spread Ammo 1
description: Ammo made for close combat. What it lacks in range, it makes up for in damage.

name: Spread Ammo 2
description: Ammo made for close combat. Deals more hits than Spread Ammo 1.

name: Spread Ammo 3
description: Max-grade ammo made for close combat. Deals numerous hits.

name: Shrapnel Ammo 1
description: Ammo that covers a wide area. Who needs accuracy when you hit this much?

name: Shrapnel Ammo 2
description: Ammo that covers a wide area. More range and even more hits than Shrapnel Ammo 1.

name: Shrapnel Ammo 3
description: Max-grade shrapnel ammo that delivers maximum range and hit-count over a wide area.

name: Sticky Ammo 1
description: Powerful pierce and burst ammo. Headshots may stun.

name: Sticky Ammo 2
description: Very powerful pierce and burst ammo. Headshots may stun.

name: Sticky Ammo 3
description: Powerful pierce and burst ammo. Headshots stun.

name: Cluster Bomb 1
description: Ammo that fragments into three shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

name: Cluster Bomb 2
description: Ammo that fragments into four shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

name: Cluster Bomb 3
description: Ammo that fragments into five shells upon impact. Beware of friendly fire!

name: Poison Ammo 1
description: Poisons target, but may require several shots.

name: Poison Ammo 2
description: Enhanced ammo that inflicts poison. Some targets require multiple shots.

name: Paralysis Ammo 1
description: Paralyzes target, but may require several shots.

name: Paralysis Ammo 2
description: Enhanced ammo that inflicts paralysis. Some targets require multiple shots.

name: Sleep Ammo 1
description: Induces sleep, but may require several shots.

name: Sleep Ammo 2
description: Enhanced ammo that inflicts sleep. Some targets require multiple shots.

name: Exhaust Ammo 1
description: Ammo that drains a monster's stamina.

name: Exhaust Ammo 2
description: Enhanced special ammo that drains a monster's stamina.

name: Recover Ammo 1
description: Ammo that restores a small amount of health to an ally upon impact.

name: Recover Ammo 2
description: Ammo that restores a moderate amount of health to an ally upon impact.

name: Demon Ammo
description: Ammo that fills the target with savage amounts of strength.

name: Armor Ammo
description: Ammo that makes the target's skin as hard as stone.

name: Flaming Ammo
description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters weak to fire element.

name: Piercing Fire Ammo
description: Piercing ammo that discharges multiple heavy-hitting fire-element shots.

name: Water Ammo
description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters weak to water element.

name: Piercing Water Ammo
description: Piercing ammo that discharges multiple heavy-hitting water-elemental shots.

name: Freeze Ammo
description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters weak to ice element.

name: Piercing Ice Ammo
description: Piercing ammo that discharges multiple heavy-hitting ice-element shots

name: Thunder Ammo
description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters weak to thunder element.

name: Piercing Thunder Ammo
description: Piercing ammo that discharges multiple heavy-hitting thunder-element shots.

name: Dragon Ammo
description: Ammo that packs a punch against monsters weak to dragon element.

name: Piercing Dragon Ammo
description: Piercing ammo that discharges multiple heavy-hitting dragon-element shots.

name: Slicing Ammo
description: Ammo that ejects sharp blades on impact, which can sever tails.

name: Wyvern Ammo
description: Ammo created through years of research into Wyvern's Fire.

name: Tranq Ammo
description: Bowgun ammo used to capture monsters ensnared in traps
